snippet: Affirmative action, abortion, public prayer and campaign contributions are among the issues to be addressed, with chances for the justices to reverse consequential precedents.
abstract: Supreme Court, following two consecutive terms that ended in historic and headline-grabbing rulings, returns from summer recess to term that will feature even larger number of heady constitutional cases; docket features extraordinary series of issues, including campaign contributions, abortion rights, affirmative action, public prayer and presidential power.
lead_paragraph: Affirmative action, abortion, public prayer and campaign contributions are among the issues to be addressed, with chances for the justices to reverse consequential precedents.

headline.main: Supreme Court Has Deep Docket in Its New Term
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Has Deep Docket In Its New Term
